pl.isangeles.senlin.core.bonus

Class DamageBonus

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.isangeles.senlin.core.bonus.Modifier
      • pl.isangeles.senlin.core.bonus.DamageBonus

  • public class DamageBonus
extends Modifier
    Class for damage bonus Note that this bonus is only dynamically added to character hit, i.e. not affect character in any other way
    Author:
    Isangeles
